attributes.additional_details: With teachers,NHS staff and emergency service workers going on strike and the government don't seem to be giving an idea or a plan on how they plan to resolve this. All it seems is, it will be back to normal at some point. We deserve to know an exact plan and it isn't fair for children to miss education and people not to get medical help when needed. I think it's time for the public to have their say and choose who they believe can now get us out of this mess. We deserve more from out government
attributes.background: I want the government and parliament to hold a general election

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631901
